title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {shiny.mui: Mui fork to shiny written with the react.shiny lilbrary},   author = {Jacob Clarke},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://quartzsoftwarellc.github.io/shiny.mui/}, }

title: Mui fork to shiny written with the react.shiny lilbrary
Box — Box
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’ component_example(tagList(   Box(backgroundColor = "blue", "Hello world!") ))

title: Button — Button.shinyInput
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’ library(magrittr)  component_example(tagList(   Button.shinyInput("button1", "Text", variant="text"),   Button.shinyInput("button1", "Contained", variant="contained"),   Button.shinyInput("button1", "Outlined", variant="outlined"), ))

title: Card — Card
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  component_example(tagList(   Card(     CardContent("Hello world!")   ) ))

title: CardContent — CardContent
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  component_example(tagList(   Card(     CardContent("Hello world!")   ) ))

title: Grid — Grid
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  component_example(tagList(   Grid(container = T, spacing = 2,      Grid(item = T, xs = 8, sx = list(backgroundColor = "red"), p("Hello")),     Grid(item = T, xs = 4, sx = list(backgroundColor = "blue"), p("Go"))   ) ))

title: List — List
code: library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’ library(shiny.mui)   component_example(List(     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "Hello", secondary = "First")),     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "World", secondary = "second")), ))

title: ListItem — ListItem
code: library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’ library(shiny.mui)   component_example(List(     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "Hello", secondary = "First")),     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "World", secondary = "second")), ))

title: ListItemText — ListItemText
code: library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’ library(shiny.mui)   component_example(List(     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "Hello", secondary = "First")),     ListItem(ListItemText(primary = "World", secondary = "second")), ))

title: Select — Select.shinyInput
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  if (interactive()) {   shinyApp(     ui = div(       TextField.shinyInput("text", fullWidth = T, value = "go"),       textOutput("textValue")     ),     server = function(input, output) {       output$textValue <- renderText({         sprintf("Value: %s", input$text)       })     }   ) }

title: TextField — TextField.shinyInput
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  if (interactive()) {   shinyApp(     ui = div(       TextField.shinyInput("text", fullWidth = T, value = "go"),       textOutput("textValue")     ),     server = function(input, output) {       output$textValue <- renderText({         sprintf("Value: %s", input$text)       })     }   ) }

title: Typography — Typography
code: library(shiny.mui) library(shiny) #> Error in library(shiny): there is no package called ‘shiny’  component_example(tagList(   Typography(variant="h1", "H1"),   Typography(variant="h2", "H2"),   Typography(variant="body1", "Body 1"), ))
